document_data.name: Crown meld
document_data.mainbody: '''''Crown meld''''' was an [[arcane]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that allowed [[mage]]s to securely repair a fragile item, or bind components together into a shell that can later be enchanted into a [[Item enchantment|magical item]].
document_data.Effects: This spell would link a series of preexisting fusions, such as those created by ''[[Merald's meld]]'', in items that were composed of four or more substances. This new shell was considered completely whole, continuous and flawless and ready to receive ''dweomers'' from ''[[focal stone]]s'' or existing enchanted items.
document_data.Components: The material components for this spell were a thumb-sized lump of resin, an [[iron]] nail, a strand of [[spider silk]], paste made from legumes and a flawless diamond, worth at least 2000 [[gp]].
